ValidationRule.description: Third Party Vendor should not be blank in case All is Unchecked
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(All_3rd_Party_Vendor__c = false, Parent_Non_Parent_VID_s__c = null, RecordType.Name = 'STP Eligibility')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If "All 3P Parent & Non-Parent Vendors" is unchecked, then Listed 3P Listed Parent & Non-Parent Vendors must be provided.
